entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the one who pulled out his wand from an inside pocket of his robes. He raised the wand to his temple and deposited silvery substance into the Pensieve.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry tensed in his chair when Snape pulled out his wand. He was instructed by Snape to stand up and take out his wand.

relationships.description: Snape deposited silvery substance into the Pensieve.
Snape instructed Harry to stand up and take out his wand.
